feed.title: Rulehunter - Find simple rules in your data to meet your goals

entry.title: Rulehunter v0.3 Released
entry.summary:
The third official version (second publicized version) of Rulehunter has been released. Please see the CHANGELOG for details. Highlights include:
Restructure of the experiment files Include a web server Reduce memory usage

entry.title: Rulehunter v0.1 Released
entry.summary: The first official version of Rulehunter has been released. It is fully functional and has been tested on Linux and Windows. It is available to install and run immediately.
